member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.IIoT.OpcUa.Api.Twin.Models.MethodCallRequestApiModel
member.remarks:
A method call request can specify the targets in several ways:
Specify methodId and objectId node ids and leave the browse paths null.
Specify an objectBrowsePath to a real object node from the node specified with objectId. If objectId is null, the root node (i=84) is used.
Specify a methodBrowsePath from the above object node to the actual method node to call on the object. methodId remains null.
Like previously, but specify methodId and method browse path from it to a real method node.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.IIoT.OpcUa.Api.Twin.Models.MethodCallRequestApiModel.MethodId
member.summary: Method id of method to call.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.IIoT.OpcUa.Api.Twin.Models.MethodCallRequestApiModel.ObjectId
member.summary: Context of the method, i.e. an object or object type node.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.IIoT.OpcUa.Api.Twin.Models.MethodCallRequestApiModel.Arguments
member.summary: Arguments for the method - null means no args

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.IIoT.OpcUa.Api.Twin.Models.MethodCallRequestApiModel.MethodBrowsePath
member.summary: An optional component path from the node identified by MethodId or from a resolved objectId to the actual method node.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.IIoT.OpcUa.Api.Twin.Models.MethodCallRequestApiModel.ObjectBrowsePath
member.summary: An optional component path from the node identified by ObjectId to the actual object or objectType node. If ObjectId is null, the root node (i=84) is used.

member.summary: Service result in case of error

member.summary: An optional component path from the node identified by MethodId to the actual method node.
